title: Ratatouille : The Guide to Remy's World
author: Glenn Dakin
description: Remy, a young French rat who dreams of becoming a French chef, is the star of a delicious new CGI-animated film from Pixar, opening in theaters on June 29 and featuring the voices of Brad Garrett, Janeane Garofalo, and Peter OUToole. This guide features a textured tablecloth cover that opens just like a real menu. Full color.
